items.title: Analytic Investigations (Intermediate Level)
items.headline: Managing an Investigation with an Association Matrix
objectives_summary: How to create an Investigative Plan. By the end of this course you will be able to clearly develop a plan of action that will keep your case moving toward completion!

How to construct an Entity of Interest Worksheet. Discovering what everyone’s connection is to the case can be challenging. By the end of this course you’ll be able to decipher who is involved, their relationship to the case, and the document(s) prove it!

How to prepare an Association Matrix. It’s suggested that a picture is worth more than words, and an Association Matrix graphically represents all the actors in a case in one simple and easy to understand manner.

Learn how journals can help you to increase interest in the task you have to do and how to simply get more done in the morning
